content: That's really helpful! I think the Pinot Grigio and Mozzarella combination would be a great "beginner" option for my sister and her friends. I'll make sure to keep it simple and focus on the flavors when presenting the wine and cheese. By the way, I've been thinking about my own retirement plans, and I've started contributing more to my 401(k) and trying to save more aggressively. Do you have any general advice on how to make the most of retirement savings?
